summary: Completed comprehensive testing of VOCT website UI updates. All requested features implemented successfully including hero image, footer restructure, 3D header effects, animated assessment panel, and services subtitle changes.

minor_issues.issue: Progress bar animation works but initial detection selector needs refinement
minor_issues.impact: Functional - progress bar animates correctly from 33% to 66% to 100% but initial state detection could be improved

passed_tests: Hero section displays physiotherapy illustration image correctly
Header 3D shadow strip effect visible and properly styled
Footer shows 'Healthcare Comes Home' tagline under VOCT
Footer Contact Us section displays '8 AM - 8 PM (All Days)'
Footer email link support@voct.in with proper mailto functionality
Footer Instagram link works with correct URL and target=_blank
Services section subtitle shows 'Expert care. Zero travel'
Assessment panel opens with 3D slide animation and perspective effects
Assessment panel progress bar animates correctly between steps
Navigation works perfectly - Home, Services, Join Us, About Us
Services navigation scrolls to correct section
Join Us navigation routes to /join-us page
About Us navigation routes to /about page
Assessment form interaction and step progression
3D card animations and hover effects in assessment panel
